Every Candidate

Wards

The (very small) "team" at Every Candidate is working hard to gather and publish information on each and eery ward in Toronto, for both Toronto city council and the Toronto District School Board.

If you'd like to know why we started this project, start here. If you'd like to take the raw data and do something interesting, please do. If you'd like to help out, please get in touch.

As of September 22nd, 2014, we are publishing the information we've collected on all 44 Toronto city council wards. In the coming days, we will publish information on the Toronto District School Board wards.
